item.description:
In this experiential workshop you will learn simple yet powerful Tantra Yoga practices to revitalize the body, quiet the mind, replenish the heart and enliven the soul.

You will learn to:

  • Ground and connect to Source
  • Deepen your connection with yourself
  • Become aware of your energy field and how it interacts with others
  • Activate the flow of kundalini in your body

In a safe space for exploration, we will use the modalities of movement, breath and sound  to access untapped aspects of you ~ to increase your vitality and expand your capacity for pleasure and joy!

Bring your curiosity and join us for an enlivening, playful evening with other like-minded souls!

Open to singles and couples of all genders and sexual orientations.

Please refrain from wearing fragrances. It is suggested to wear comfortable clothing to move in and to bring a water bottle.

$30/each at the door

EARLY BIRD DISCOUNT: $20/each for the first 10 people to register by May 10!

Brynn Bishop is a Tantra Educator and Holistic Sex and Relationship Coach with over 25 years experience in the fields of body-mind integration and conscious relating. Her passion is guiding people on the path of intimacy, freedom and fulfillment. Brynn is known for her down-to-earth, welcoming presence and her contagious enthusiasm. She maintains a private practice in Boston and internationally via phone and Skype.

“Great class, it was my first experience with Tantra but everyone was nice and I felt comfortable being there. It really does raise energy, and I even had an emotional release because energy got unblocked in my system. I'm so glad I went. Great teacher! ” -Anna

“A wonderful way to get in touch and regain some of our lost parts. Brynn led us into the world of everyday intimacy in a very safe and fun environment. She will definitely help you open up to new possibilities.” -Rob
item.name: Introduction to Tantric Intimacy: For Curious & Open Beginners!
